entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
